pr_title: Fix bug where replace errors did not appear with the correct file

timeline.bodyText: Why are these statements in a block?
timeline.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: I have a habit (from style guidelines in a past life) of scoping variables only used for a line or two. In this case it really doesn't matter since the scope ends two lines later so I removed the block.
replies.author: melissa-barca
